channel.title: Class36 Problem
channel.description:
hey all
I followed the tutorial to make a pi webclient but they say change
In Class36, search for:
Code:
[code]abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./Cache/data/" + file + ".dat");[/code]
Change that to:
Code:
[code]abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "data/" + file + ".dat");[/code]
But [code]abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./Cache/data/" + file + ".dat");[/code] doesnt exist
Help me please!

item.title: Class36 Problem
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Groen Mod Groen
item.description:
@Mod_Groen wrote:

hey all

I followed the tutorial to make a pi webclient but they say change

In Class36, search for:

Change that to:

    [code]abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile(sign.signlink.findcachedir() + "data/" + file + ".dat");[/code]

But abyte0 = FileOperations.ReadFile("./Cache/data/" + file + ".dat"); doesnt exist

Help me please!
